Ayuda Media Systems | Fulltime Onsite | Montreal & Germany

Ayuda Media Systems was founded in 2003 with the objective of building the worldâ€™s best Out Of Home (OOH) software. Join us, and your code will drive 10-million-dollar digital billboards and empower businesses on all five continents (Antarctica is currently excluded).

We are looking for iOS and .Net developers for onsite positions in Montreal or Germany. For more information, visit http://careers.stackoverflow.com/company/ayuda#jobs.

Interested in applying? Take our dev challenge! http://www.ayudasystems.com/Jobs?id=18139#devchallenge
